research_content:
Perfect! Now let me compile the complete structured data with all the information gathered:

---

## Southwest States Veterans Affairs Offices Research

Based on current web research (2026), here is the comprehensive information for State Veterans Affairs offices in the Southwest region:

## Texas

- **Agency:** Texas Veterans Commission
- **Address:** Main office and regional locations (See Directory below)
- **Phone:** (512) 463-6564 | Toll-Free: 1-800-252-8387 (VETS)
- **Website:** https://tvc.texas.gov/
- **Regional offices:** Multiple field offices throughout the state including Ft. Hood Field Office. Complete directory available at https://tvc.texas.gov/directory/

---

## Arizona

- **Agency:** Arizona Department of Veterans' Services
- **Address:** 1688 W. Adams Street, Phoenix, AZ 85007
- **Phone:** (602) 255-3373
- **Fax:** (602) 255-1038
- **Website:** https://dvs.az.gov/
- **Regional offices:** 19 Veterans Benefits Offices throughout the state. Office locator tool available on main website. Additional facilities include four State Veterans Homes (Flagstaff, Phoenix, Tucson, Yuma) and three Arizona Veterans' Memorial Cemeteries (Bellemont, Marana, Sierra Vista)

---

## New Mexico

- **Agency:** New Mexico Department of Veterans Services
- **Address (Santa Fe):** Bataan Memorial Building, 407 Galisteo St., Room 134, Santa Fe, NM 87501
- **Address (Albuquerque):** 4801 Indian School Rd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87113
- **Phone:** (505) 218-3125 (Santa Fe) | (505) 383-2400 (Albuquerque)
- **Website:** https://www.nmdvs.org/
- **Regional offices:** 16 field offices throughout the state, each staffed by an accredited Veterans Service Officer. Additional offices include:
  - Farmington: 1800 E 30th St C, Farmington, NM 87401, (505) 327-2861
  - Gallup: 908 E. Buena Vista Ave., Gallup, NM 87301, (505) 389-8731
  - Complete list at https://www.nmdvs.org/field-offices/

---

## Nevada

- **Agency:** Nevada Department of Veterans Services
- **Address (Reno - Headquarters):** 9400 Gateway Drive, Suite A, Reno, NV 89521
- **Phone:** (775) 688-1653
- **Fax:** (775) 688-1656
- **Address (Las Vegas):** Storey Building, 7220 Bermuda Road, Las Vegas, NV 89119
- **Phone (Las Vegas):** (702) 486-3830
- **Website:** https://veterans.nv.gov/
- **Regional offices:** Multiple Veterans Service Officer locations including:
  - North Las Vegas: 6900 N. Pecos Rd., Room 1C238, North Las Vegas, NV 89086, (702) 224-6025
  - Reno: 5460 Reno Corporate Dr. Suite 131, Reno, NV 89511, (775) 321-4880
  - Carson City: 106 E Adams St. Suite 203, Carson City, NV 89706, (775) 321-4880
  - Fallon: 485 W. B Street, Suite 103, Fallon, NV 89406, (775) 321-4880
  - Elko: 1500 College Parkway – McMullen Hall, Room 114, Elko, NV 89801, (775) 321-4880

---

## Utah

- **Agency:** Utah Department of Veterans and Military Affairs
- **Address:** 550 Foothill Drive, Suite 105, Salt Lake City, UT 84113
- **Mailing Address:** PO Box 581217, Salt Lake City, UT 84113
- **Phone:** (801) 326-2372 | Toll-Free: (800) 894-9497
- **Fax:** (801) 326-2369
- **Email:** veterans@utah.gov
- **Website:** https://veterans.utah.gov/
- **Regional offices:** VA-accredited Veterans Service Officers (VSOs) organized by four regions: Northern Utah, Salt Lake Metro, Central Utah, and Southern Utah. Details at https://veterans.utah.gov/regional-offices/

---

## Colorado

- **Agency:** Colorado Division of Veterans Affairs (Part of Department of Military and Veterans Affairs)
- **Address:** 155 Van Gordon, Suite 201, Lakewood, CO 80228
- **Phone:** (303) 914-5832
- **Fax:** (303) 914-5835
- **Website:** https://vets.colorado.gov/
- **Regional offices:** County Veterans Service Offices (CVSOs) throughout the state. Notable locations include:
  - Aurora: Altura Plaza, 15400 E 14th Pl, Suite 501, Aurora, CO 80011
  - Denver: Bill Daniels Veteran Service Center, 1247 Sante Fe, Denver, CO 80204
  - Fort Collins: 200 West Oak Street, Suite 5000, PO Box 1190, Fort Collins, CO 80522-1190
  - Durango (La Plata County): Riverside Professional Bldg, 1970 East 3rd Ave., Suite 102, Durango, CO 81301
  - Cortez (Montezuma County): 107 N. Chestnut Suite #205, Cortez, CO 81321
  - Complete county office locator at https://vets.colorado.gov/services/county-veterans-service-offices

---

## Sources

- [Texas Veterans Commission - Contact Us](https://tvc.texas.gov/contact/)
- [Arizona Department of Veterans' Services](https://dvs.az.gov/)
- [New Mexico Department of Veterans Services](https://www.nmdvs.org/)
- [New Mexico Field Offices](https://www.nmdvs.org/field-offices/)
- [Nevada Department of Veterans Services](https://veterans.nv.gov/)
- [Nevada Veterans Service Officers](https://veterans.nv.gov/benefits-and-services/veterans-service-officers/)
- [Utah Department of Veterans and Military Affairs - Contact](https://veterans.utah.gov/about-us/contact/)
- [Utah Regional Offices](https://veterans.utah.gov/regional-offices/)
- [Colorado Division of Veterans Affairs - Contact](https://vets.colorado.gov/dva-contact-about)
- [Colorado County Veterans Service Offices](https://vets.colorado.gov/services/county-veterans-service-offices)
